Name: Say Hello to SmartSpyAi: Revolutionizing Smart Contract Auditing with AI
Slug: Say Hello to SmartSpyAi: Revolutionizing Smart Contract Auditing with AI
PostBody:
On the back of $3.6Billion in losses in 2022 ensuring smart contract security and resilience is paramount, in fact, the future of Web3 depends on it.

Enter SmartSpyAi, an advanced, AI-powered, self-learning smart contract auditor with the ability to detect vulnerabilities in granular detail, redefining the approach to smart contract security. Leveraging advanced AI, machine and deep learning, combined with multiple analysis techniques, SmartSpyAi brings unparalleled continuous and comprehensive vulnerability assessment to the forefront of smart contract auditing.

The importance of smart contract audits

Smart contract audits are critical because they identify the vulnerabilities that lead to exploits. Deploying unaudited contracts carries substantial risks, as any flaws are easily exploited allowing assets to be stolen or frozen. However, the complexity and inefficiencies of traditional audits has led to the emergence of AI solutions that can automate and assist with the process. By offering benefits like increased speed, accuracy, and coverage at lower costs, AI enables smart contract auditing to be more robust, allowing blockchain and Web3 to scale securely.

Current challenges with manual audits

Traditional manual audits, while foundational, are like faded photographs ‚Äî static snapshots in time unable to capture the evolving risks of Web3. This can leave many projects exposed to emerging threats, especially zero-day vulnerabilities. In addition, smart contract auditing is inefficient and error-prone, unable to keep pace with the rapidly growing volume of smart contracts. Auditors must painstakingly review code line-by-line, which is time-consuming and expensive, even experienced auditors can overlook vulnerabilities in complex, evolving code with many recent examples coming to light, following contract exploits.

Static and dynamic testing methods used in isolation have limited capabilities to detect issues across various execution paths, while manual processes can open the door for collusion and fraud.

The explosion in growth in smart contracts is making comprehensive human-based code reviews become unfeasible.

The limitations of manual and siloed testing techniques result in vulnerabilities going undetected, leading to exploits and massive financial losses post-deployment. Automated solutions like AI and machine learning are needed to analyze large volumes of smart contracts quickly, accurately, and cost-effectively.

How AI can assist auditing

Artificial intelligence is transforming traditional auditing by automating repetitive tasks while providing deeper vulnerability analysis. Natural language processing models enable the review of extensive, historical on-chain data, while machine learning directly detects anomalies and risks in detail, referencing the collective knowledge gained through deep learning.

Pattern recognition can identify inconsistencies across complex datasets, while automated testing thoroughly validates controls and transactions. In addition dynamic fuzzing and simulations which can be run for longer lengths of time, model different scenarios to stress test systems much at a much deeper level than humans can

Overall, AI allows for more comprehensive, efficient and accurate audits. The main benefits include processing higher volumes of data for complete coverage, surfacing insights humans could miss, while freeing auditors to focus on judgment-intensive issues.

AI will not replace auditors but rather augment their capabilities.

The combination of AI and human expertise leads to higher quality audits and assurance. AI assures audits keep pace with the scale and complexity of modern business models and evolving security threats.

SmartSpyAi‚Äôs approach

SmartSpyAi is an advanced self-learning smart contract analyzer that uses AI to detect vulnerabilities and report on them, at a granular level, on-chain. Leveraging cutting-edge AI techniques like machine learning, deep learning, and Swarm intelligence, SmartSpyAi automates a majority of the smart contract audit process.

Combining multiple analysis techniques like static, semi-static, symbolic, formal, dynamic, and intelligent fuzzing in collaboration with AI and machine learning, SmartSpyAi builds a collective intelligence by sharing vulnerability knowledge across platforms, to provide deeper visibility into vulnerabilities and risks. When one analysis technique identifies a new vulnerability, it communicates its findings across the network, and all other analyzers learn and update their shared rules and models.

To reach this new evolution, SmartSpyAi utilizes Naoris Protocol‚Äôs Decentralized Swarm AI that is trained on a vast dataset of over 2.2+ million Ethereum contracts, to constantly refine and improve its analysis algorithm. Building an extensive knowledge base of known and unknown vulnerabilities, Swarm AI continuously learns and adapts to new and emerging contract types while rigorous training and continuous testing ensures a high level of precision.

This means SmartSpyAi can analyze against 200+ types of functional and conformance vulnerabilities, including all Smart Contract Weakness Classifications (SWC) and EEA EthTrust Security Levels

As SmartSpyAi gets smarter over time, smart contracts get more security over time. Using a test, fix, learn and retest process, developers can easily integrate SmartSpyAi into their development and QA process, building secure and resilient smart contracts pre-deployment. Post deployment, SmartSpyAi easily integrates to support on-the-fly contract updates while in the live environment, SmartSpyAi supports the entire smart contract lifecycle

Delivering comprehensive on-chain audits within 48 hours, actionable reporting provides specific recommendations for fixing vulnerabilities, remediation tips and best practices for comprehensive contract safety. As all reports are recorded on-chain, SmartSpyAi is the perfect auditing platform for referencing historical proof of audit security, for real time compliance purposes.

Benefits of SmartSpyAi‚Äôs AI Auditing

SmartSpyAi provides faster, more accurate, and lower cost audits compared to manual methods. Automating repetitive tasks means audits can be performed 24/7, with SmartSpyAi capable of auditing over 1000 contracts in the time it takes to manually audit one. Thanks to machine learning fewer vulnerabilities are missed, detecting nuances human audits may omit, with AI continuously updating the platform with new vulnerabilities.

SmartSpyAi is built to integrate with human auditors to validate results.

Specific AI techniques include neural networks, automated fuzz testing, symbolic execution, and formal verification. The system provides automated scanning, enhanced cybersecurity, while reducing false positives making significant cost savings.

Minimizing manual review efforts enhances cybersecurity by identifying risks early, enabling scalability, while on-chain actionable insights provides continuous compliance which is sorely missing in today‚Äôs space of traditional audits. A risk-based prioritization approach focuses efforts on the most critical issues first to minimize potential damages. Its web-based on-demand availability, easy SDK integration, and advanced vulnerability management capabilities equip organizations to effectively manage any smart contract risks.

Top projects face immense scrutiny. With SmartSpyAi, you can rapidly audit at scale, assure investors, and maintain your position.

Conclusion

Overall, SmartSpyAi delivers enhanced cybersecurity, significant cost savings, streamlined compliance, intuitive workflows, and advanced vulnerability management. The combination of ecosystem maturity, exclusive vulnerability intelligence, and advanced AI techniques ensure high accuracy, scalability, and continuous and shared expanded learning.

The future looks bright for more secure and resilient smart contracts. Join us as SmartSpyAi is poised to revolutionize smart contract auditing for developers, and organizations of all sizes.

About SmartSpyAi

SmartSpyAi is an advanced Ai-driven self-learning smart contract analyzer that combines multiple analysis techniques and AI to provide granular visibility into emerging threats captured as on-chain reports.

This potent AI audit platform learns and builds a shared decentralized intelligence over time, serving as an essential defense against security threats for developers, audit firms, and Web3 enterprises. The more smart contracts SmartSpyAi analyzes, the more secure smart contracts become.

Unleashing the power of AI to secure the blockchain. The future of smart contract auditing is here.

Learn more: https://www.smartspy.ai/

Name: Naoris Protocol | Summer Round Up 2023
PostBody:
Greetings Naorians!

We are thrilled to reconnect with our loyal community and share some exciting updates about Naoris Protocol and the future of decentralised cybersecurity.

It's been a crazy summer for our C-Suite and Sales teams who embarked on a whirlwind tour to represent Naoris Protocol on the global stage.

Showcasing the power of our Decentralised CyberSecurity Mesh in the Telco, Smart Car, Robotics & Automation, IoT, and Smart Cities sectors, the world took notice, and so we'd like to share a few of those highlights with you below.

While the crypto and global market's ebb and flow, our devoted team has been working tirelessly behind the scenes, developing all aspects of our mighty protocol with eyes on the core mission - to safeguard Web2 and Web3 with unwavering dedication and expertise.

In the coming months, we will keep you intimately connected with every aspect, from the latest tech developments to groundbreaking next gen product releases that harness Naoris Protocol's unparalleled strength.

So, Naorians, buckle up for an incredible ride ahead. We are endlessly grateful to our community for the chance to create a better digital world‚Ä¶together we shall illuminate the path forward!

Onward,
The Naoris Protocol Team

‚Äç

Winners of 'The Most Engaging Presentation' Award - Deutsche Telekom T Challenge 2023

Naoris Protocol are proud to be named as one of six winners at the Deutsche Telekom T Challenge Awards 2023

Co-founders David and Monica captivated the judges and audience and with our Decentralised Cybersecurity Mesh solution, as winners we want to share our winning presentation with our community.

The next step is to work with T-Mobile/Deutsche Telekom on this amazing opportunity and integrate our Mesh Security solution with the Telco sector following this event.

CAR Management Briefing Seminars Conference - Keynote Speech

Founder & CEO David Carvalho took to the stage at the prestigious CAR Management Briefing Seminars Conference in Canada with a thought-provoking keynote speech in collaboration with one of our key partners Level One Robotics to highlight the critical role of #cybersecurity in vehicles.

Naoris Protocol have integrated its technology with Level One Robotics with the aim to reduce all cyber threats facing critical car controls within the Smart Car industry to zero. Current Smart Car/E-Vehicle technology is centralised and vulnerable to attacks, Naoris Protocol is creating brighter a future in the sector where advanced connectivity and autonomous technologies are secured by Naoris Protocol's Decentralised CyberSecurity Mesh üëâ Twitter Post

Collision Conference & Expo - Keynote and Start Up Speeches

The Naoris Protocol team had a fantastic few days, knowledge sharing, networking, and inspiring at the Collision Conference!

Founder & CEO David Carvalho delivered a compelling session on the impressive centre stage, giving a quick overview of Naoris Protocol, the solution, and the people behind it! üëè

A big shout out also to CTO Sumit Chauhan, CFO Scott McAndrew, and the ever-dynamic Bus Dev team üëâ Twitter Post

‚Äç

Casablanca Smart City Event - Keynote Speech

Founder & CEO David Carvalho and advisor Nuno Marques de Almeida, University Professor at Instituto Superior T√©cnico, gave their keynote speech at the 7th edition of Casablanca Smart City event by Casablanca Events et Animation, titled 'Towards a Decentralised Cyber Security Mesh Future for critical engineering assets in Smart Cities'. üï∏Ô∏èüîí üëâ Twitter Post

‚Äç

#FuturECar Conference - Keynote Speech

Founder & CEO David Carvalho, was invited to present on cybersecurity protection for the Smart & Electric Vehicle industry at the inaugural FuturECar Conference at the University of Windsor, Canada.

Naoris Protocol's compelling use case utilises Decentralised CyberSecurity Mesh and Swarm AI to secure all systems, devices and data associated with Smart/E-Cars.

The event was a great opportunity to present to Smart & Electric Vehicle industry professionals, including Prof. Jimi Tjong, Technical Lead at Ford Motor Company and Milan Gasko, President / CEO of Level One Robotics, who is an early Naoris Protocol investor.

‚Äç

Shattered Trust: Ledger's New Recovery Feature Stirs Up Crypto Security Concerns

Ledger's recent introduction of its new "Ledger Recovery" feature has stirred the proverbial pot. Aimed at mitigating the problem of users losing access to their cryptocurrency due to forgotten seed phrases or damaged hardware wallets, Ledger's new $9 a month subscription service has elicited rigorous debate, with a myriad of questions around security and privacy.

In this analysis, our Founder & CEO offers a sobering and insightful view of the two main arguments üëâ Link

‚Äç

Naoris Protocol Analysis of Web3 cyberattacks in Q1 2023

The cyber attack trend on Web3 & DeFi shows no signs of receding, on the contrary it's increasing at an alarming rate.

Our analysis shows that there was a rise in the number of reported cybersecurity hacks on Web3 and DeFi in Q1 2023 compared to the same period in 2022 and 2021 ‚Äì with 19 reported hacks.

Check out the full analysis here comparing Q1 of the last 3 years üëâ Link
